Address.label: Address
Address.value: C/O STAR BULK MANAGEMENT INC,40 AGIOU KONSTANTINOU STREET, ATHENS, 15124, Greece

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Star Bulk Carriers Corp provides seaborne transportation solutions in the dry bulk sector. The company owns and operates dry bulk carrier vessels, which are used to transport major bulks, such as iron ore, coal, grains, bauxite, fertilizers, and steel products. It owns a fleet of vessels that consists of Newcastlemax, Capesize, Post Panamax, Kamsarmax, Panamax, Panamax, and Supramax. It generates revenues through the voyages it carries out.
